name: Introduction to Chinese Culture
description: This course provides a brief overview of Chinese culture. The topics include Chinese civilization, customs, traditions, rituals, religion, philosophy, ideology, morals, literature, folk art and craft, performance arts, martial arts, cuisine, medicine, etc. The discussions may be either historical or contemporary. [36L]
prerequisites: CHI201H5, CHI202H5 OR appropriate language level indicated by language assessment questionnaire.
